message: I think this is a fair start.  Let's get this money divided!
You got a good offer in round 1, but I'm trying to get a better deal!
I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a fairer share than your last offer.  Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a compromise.
This is my final offer.  We need to reach an agreement before the inflation eats away too much more of our money.
